title: And So It Begins
text:
Hello, and welcome to my new corner of the internet.
I created this blog for a simple reason: I wanted a place to jot down thoughts as they come. Itâ€™s a space for the random ideas, the sometimes trivial musings, and the interesting things I happen to come across :)

title: My thoughts on toothpastes - H2 â€™25
text:
Iâ€™ve tried a lot of toothpastes over the years, especially moving between Germany and India. While the general recommendation of â€œas long as thereâ€™s flouride in your toothpaste, anything worksâ€ is strictly true, the follwoing breakdown considers mainly the taste, after-taste and how easily it lathers, for my case in particular. Here are my quick thoughts on a few of them, starting with my current go-to.






TipğŸ† Top Recommendation: Aronal



Price: â‚¬â‚¬
The mild aftertaste of cloves is the most balanced Iâ€™ve ever found in any toothpaste. Combined with its excellent fluoride content and optimal pH level, this is my daily morning go-to.



Other Noteworthy Mentions
